servinfo.title: Engine noise – Crankshaft noise
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection and Engine Basic Inspection .

attention3.ptxt: Before checking mechanical noise, make sure that:

action.ptxt: Main Bearings, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Inspection:For J20 Engine or Main Bearings Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
Main Bearings, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Inspection:For J20 Engine or Crankshaft Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
Main Bearings, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine or Main Bearings, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT
Main Bearings, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Inspection:For J20 Engine or Crankshaft Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
